title: Arrangement of fonts on your system?
content:
Hi folks!

I was just wondering how you guys arrange all your fonts on your system?  
My setup is Font Explorer on Mac and I've divided things into Foundries, Workhorses (most used) and Clients.

Perhaps you're going all in with Serif, Sans, Handwritten etc. etc. ?

Thanks and take care :-)

/s
author: superfetz

comments.content: On my iPad I have two locations, one for all the fonts the iGods have chosen to provide, and another location for all the fonts that I wish I were able to use on the device. ;-)

I use Suitcase on Mac; all my fonts are in alphabetical folders, no discriminating between foundries or type styles.

I do have a basic set I always have activated, and I have special sets for specific large projects.
